BackstoryDef.title: Manufactured Gamma
BackstoryDef.description: Mechadroids are not born, they are made, subtle imperfections result in various traits in their personality but their initial skills tend to be rather specific. Gammas are capable of any task, though they aren't really good at anything.

BackstoryDef.title: Perfect Gamma
BackstoryDef.description: Mechadroids are not born, they are made, subtle imperfections result in various traits in their personality but their initial skills tend to be rather specific. This Gamma came out even better than in the blueprint, still not particularly great in any specific way though.

BackstoryDef.title: Faulty Gamma
BackstoryDef.description: Mechadroids are not born, they are made, subtle imperfections result in various traits in their personality but their initial skills tend to be rather specific. This Gamma came out a slight bit faulty so their skills have been skewed here and there.

BackstoryDef.title: Gamma Farmer
BackstoryDef.description: Through their life this Gamma has gained some skills to help them farm better.

BackstoryDef.title: Gamma Crafter
BackstoryDef.description: Through their life this Gamma has gained some skills to help them craft better.

BackstoryDef.title: Gamma Scientist
BackstoryDef.description: Through their life this Gamma has gained some skills to help them research better.

BackstoryDef.title: Gamma Cook
BackstoryDef.description: Through their life this Gamma has gained some skills to help them cook better.
